      • Bloodsecrator [120pts]

        Selections: 0. Thirst for Carnage, Ensorcelled Axe, General

        Categories: Bloodbound, Bloodsecrator, Chaos, Hero, KHORNE, Leader, Mortal, Totem, General

        Ability Ability Ref
        Loathsome Sorcery Re-roll successfull casting rolls for WIZARDS within 16" of this model, before any unbinding rolls are made.
        Rage of Khorne Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly KHORNE units while they are wholly within 16" of any models with this ability.
        Command Traits Command Trait Ref
        Thirst for Carnage A BALEFUL LORDS general must have this command trait.

        Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly BALEFUL LORDS BLOODTHIRSTERS within 8" of this general.

    • Other Units [280pts]

      • Wrathmongers [280pts]

        Selections: 2x 5 Wrathmongers [280pts], Wrath-flails

        Categories: Bloodbound, Chaos, KHORNE, Mortal, Other Units, Wrathmongers

        Ability: Bloodfury, Crimson Haze, Furious Assault, Unit: Wrathmongers, Weapon: Wrath-flails


        Ability Ability Ref
        Bloodfury If a model in this unit is slain, before it is removed from play roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of that model. Add 1 to the dice roll if 2 or more models from that enemy unit are within 1" of the slain model. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved. On a 6+ that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Crimson Haze Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by KHORNE units while they are wholly within 8" of any units with this ability. This ability has no effect on WRATHMONGERS.
        Furious Assault Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit if it made a charge move in the same turn.
        Unit MoveWoundsSaveBravery Ref
        Wrathmongers 5"35+7
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo-HitTo-WoundRendDamage Ref
        Wrath-flails Melee2"44+3+-11

        • Bloodstoker [80pts]

          Selections: Blood Whip, Torture Blade

          Categories: Bloodbound, Bloodstoker, Chaos, Hero, KHORNE, Leader, Mortal

          Ability: Whipped to Fury, Unit: Bloodstoker, Weapon: Blood Whip, Torture Blade

        • Slaughterpriest [100pts]

          Selections: 2. Blood Sacrifice, Bloodbathed Axe

          Categories: Bloodbound, Chaos, Hero, KHORNE, Leader, Mortal, Priest, Slaughterpriest

          Ability: Scorn of Sorcery, Prayer: - Bloodfuelled Prayers, Blood Bind, Blood Boil, Blood Sacrifice, Unit: Slaughterpriest, Weapon: Bloodbathed Axe


        Ability Ability Ref
        Frenzied Devotion Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE TOTEMS.
        Scorn of Sorcery This model can attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD. In addition, this model can attempt to dispel one endless spell at the start of your hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
        Whipped to Fury At the start of your movement phase, you can pick 1 other friendly KHORNE MORTAL unit wholly within 8" of this model. Until your next movement phase, you can add 3" to run and charge rolls made for that unit. In addition, until your next movement phase you can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by that unit. A
        unit cannot be picked to benefit from this ability more than once per turn.
        BATTLELINE Condition Ref
        BATTLELINE This unit is Battleline
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Ref
        Feeding Frenzy Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by BLOODREAVERS units from this battalion while they are wholly within 16" of a SLAUGHTERPRIEST from the same battalion.
        Prayer Prayer Ref
        - Bloodfuelled Prayers In your hero phase, this model can chant one of the following prayers. If it does so, pick one of the prayers and then make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, this model suffers D3 mortal wounds and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3, the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered.
        Blood Bind If this prayer is answered, pick 1 enemy unit within 16" of the model chanting this prayer and not within 3" of any friendly units. Your opponent must move that unit a number of inches equal to the prayer roll. The first model to be moved from that unit must finish the move as close as possible to the closest unit from the chanting model’s army. Any remaining models in that unit must finish their move within 1" of a model from their unit that has already been moved, and as close as possible to the closest unit from the chanting model's army.
        Blood Boil If this prayer is answered, pick 1 enemy unit within 16" of the model chanting this prayer. That unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Blood Sacrifice At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, the model chanting this prayer suffers 1 mortal wound and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3, the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a friendly KHORNE unit wholly within 8" of the model chanting this prayer. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds and you receive 1 Blood Tithe point.
        Unit MoveWoundsSaveBravery Ref
        Bloodreavers 6"16+5
        Bloodstoker 6"54+8
        Slaughterpriest 6"65+8
        Unit Options Unit Option Ref
        Chieftain 1 model in this unit can be a Chieftain. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's melee weapons.
        Hornblower 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.
        Icon Bearer 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo-HitTo-WoundRendDamage Ref

        Battalion Abilities: Fierce Rivals

          Selections: Great Axe of Khorne

          Ability: Fly, Outrageous Carnage, Rage Unbound, Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage Wounds: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Command Abilities: Bloodthirsty Charge, Unit: Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage, Weapon: Great Axe of Khorne

        • Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster [300pts]

          Selections: 0 -- Black Brass Crown, Bloodflail, Hellfire Breath, Mighty Axe of Khorne

          Categories: Behemoth, Bloodthirster, Chaos, Daemon, Greater Daemon, Hero, KHORNE, Leader, Monster, Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster, Artefacts

          Ability: Fly, Hellfire Breath, Relentless Hunter, Rune-crown of Khorne, Artefacts: Black Brass Crown, Command Abilities: Lord of the Blood Hunt, Unit: Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster, Weapon: Bloodflail, Hellfire Breath, Mighty Axe of Khorne, Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster Wounds: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+


        Ability Ability Ref
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Hellfire Breath Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with Hellfire Breath. Instead, pick an enemy unit that is in range of the attack and roll a dice. On a 2+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Outrageous Carnage If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by this model is 6, each enemy unit within 8" of this model suffers the number of mortal wounds shown on the damage table above, in addition to any normal damage.
        Rage Unbound You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by this model if it made a charge move in the same turn.
        Relentless Hunter Your can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this model that target a HERO or MONSTER.
        Rune-crown of Khorne This model can attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase as if it were a WIZARD. In addition, add 2 to unbinding rolls for this model. In addition, this model can attempt to dispel one endless spell at the start of your hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
        Artefacts Artefact Ref
        Black Brass Crown The first BALEFUL LORDS HERO to receive an artefact of power must be given the Black Brass Crown.

        Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target the bearer.
        Harvester of Skulls Pick 1 of the bearer’s melee weapons. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Ref
        Fierce Rivals After a model from this battalion has fought in the combat phase for the first time, you can pick another model from the same battalion that has not yet fought in that combat phase and is within 3" of any enemy units. That model fights immediately, before the opposing player picks a unit to fight in that combat phase. That model cannot fight again in that combat phase unless an ability or spell allows it to fight more than once.
        Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage Wounds MoveGreat Axe of KhorneOutrageous Carnage Ref

        07-09 8"42 mortal wounds
        10-12 7"41 mortal wound
        13+ 6"31 mortal wound
        Command Abilities Command Ability Ref
        Bloodthirsty Charge You can use this command ability at the start of your charge phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly KHORNE DAEMON units wholly within 16" of that model when the charge roll is made.
        Lord of the Blood Hunt You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly KHORNE DAEMON unit wholly within 16" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of the phase you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by that unit.

    • Malign Sorcery & Extras [50pts]

      • Extra Command Point [50pts]

        Categories: Malign Sorcery & Extras

        Restriction: Extra Command Point


        Restriction Restriction Ref
        Extra Command Point You begin the battle with one additional Command Point.

      • Terrain Feature - Skull Altar

        Categories: KHORNE, Malign Sorcery & Extras, Scenery, Skull Altar

        Scenery Rules: Witchbane, Words of Hate, Scenery Set-Up: Skull Altar Set-Up


        Scenery Rules Scenery Rule Ref
        Witchbane Subtract 1 from casting rolls for WIZARDS while they are within 16" of this model.
        Words of Hate You can re-roll prayer and Judgment rolls for friendly KHORNE PRIESTS wholly within 8" of this model.
        Scenery Set-Up Set-Up Rules Ref
        Skull Altar Set-Up A Khorne army can include 1 SKULL ALTAR terrain feature.

        After territories have been chosen but before armies have been set up, you can set up the SKULL ALTAR for your army. The SKULL ALTAR must be set up wholly within your territory and more than 3" from any other terrain features and more than 1" from any objectives. If both players can set up any terrain features before armies are set up, they must roll off, and the winner chooses who sets up their terrain features first.

    • List Options

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance, List Options

        • Khorne

          Selections: The Baleful Lords

          Categories: PlusOneBehemoth, Sub-Allegiance

          Allegiance Abilities: Blood for the Blood God, Locus of Fury, Slaughterhosts, Summon Daemons of Khorne, Unbound Slaughter, Blood Tithe Rewards Table: 1 - Bloody Exemplar, 2 - Spelleater Curse, 3 - Murderhost, 4 - Apoplectic Frenzy, 5 - Brass Skull Meteor, 6 - Relentless Fury, 7 - Crimson Rain, 8 - Slaughter Triumphant, Blood Tithe Summoning Table: (01) 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne, (02) 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster, (03) Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury, (04) 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage, (05) 20 Bloodletters, (06) 15 Bloodletters, (07) 10 Flesh Hounds, (08) 1 Skull Cannon, (09) 3 Bloodcrushers, (10) 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne, (11) 10 Bloodletters, (12) 5 Flesh Hounds, (13) 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne, (14) 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne, (15) 5 Bloodletters, Command Abilities: Frenzied Annihilator


        Allegiance Abilities Allegiance Ability Ref
        Blood for the Blood God You can receive rewards from the Blood Tithe Rewards Table below by using Blood Tithe points. You receive 1 Blood Tithe point each time a unit is destroyed.

        At the start of the hero phase, you can use 1 or more Blood Tithe points to receive 1 reward from the Blood Tithe Rewards table below. Immediately carry out that reward’s effect. Each reward costs a number of points, as shown on the Blood Tithe Rewards table, and you can only receive a reward if you have enough Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. Note that Blood Tithe points can be spent to receive the Spelleater Curse reward at any point during the hero phase, instead of at the start of the hero phase.

        If you choose a reward, after resolving its effects your Blood Tithe points total is reset to zero.
        Locus of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly KHORNE DAEMON units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly KHORNE DAEMON HEROES, or wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE GREATER DAEMONS.
        Slaughterhosts If your army is a Khorne army, you can give it a Slaughterhost keyword. All Khorne units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Slaughterhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Slaughterhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Slaughterhosts listed below, or choose another Slaughterhost you have read about or created yourself. If you choose one from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Slaughterhost on the page indicated. If you choose a different Slaughterhost, simply pick the Slaughterhost that most closely matches the nature of your own.

        • REAPERS OF VENGEANCE
        • BLOODLORDS
        • GORETIDE
        • SKULLFIEND TRIBE
        Summon Daemons of Khorne You can summon units of KHORNE DAEMONS to the battlefield by expending Blood Tithe points.

        If you have 2 or more Blood Tithe points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one unit from the list below onto the battlefield, and add it to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of Blood Tithe points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. If you summon a unit in this manner, your Blood Tithe points total is reset to zero immediately after the unit has been set up (you cannot save any Blood Tithe points you did not use). Units summoned in this way must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly KHORNE HERO or SKULL ALTAR and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Unbound Slaughter Friendly BALEFUL LORDS BLOODTHIRSTERS can run and still charge later in the same turn.

        In addition, if you are fighting a Pitched Battle, you can include 1 additional Behemoth in your army, as long as every Behemoth in your army is a BLOODTHIRSTER.
        Blood Tithe Rewards Table Reward Ref
        1 - Bloody Exemplar You receive 1 command point.
        2 - Spelleater Curse Choose this reward immediately after a WIZARD has cast a spell anywhere on the battlefield, before any attempts to unbind that spell are made. That spell is not successfully cast.
        3 - Murderhost Pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit; that unit can make a normal move. If it is within 12" of an enemy model, it can either make a normal move or attempt to make a charge move.
        4 - Apoplectic Frenzy Pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit within 3" of an enemy unit. That KHORNE unit can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        5 - Brass Skull Meteor Pick 1 unit anywhere on the battlefield; that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, roll a dice for each unit within 8" of that unit; on a 3+ the unit being rolled for suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 6, the unit being rolled for suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        6 - Relentless Fury Until your next hero phase, each time a friendly KHORNE model is slain in the combat phase, before the model is removed from play, it can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        7 - Crimson Rain You can choose this reward once per battle. Immediately after you do so, and at the start of each of your subsequent hero phases, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to each friendly KHORNE unit on the battlefield.
        8 - Slaughter Triumphant You can choose this reward once per battle. After you do so, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly KHORNE unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Blood Tithe Summoning Table Cost Ref
        (01) 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne 16
        (02) 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster 8
        (03) Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury 8
        (04) 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage 8
        (05) 20 Bloodletters 7
        (06) 15 Bloodletters 6
        (07) 10 Flesh Hounds 6
        (08) 1 Skull Cannon 5
        (09) 3 Bloodcrushers 5
        (10) 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne 4
        (11) 10 Bloodletters 4
        (12) 5 Flesh Hounds 3
        (13) 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne 3
        (14) 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne 2
        (15) 5 Bloodletters 2
        Command Abilities Command Ability Ref
        Frenzied Annihilator You can use this command ability in the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly BALEFUL LORDS BLOODTHIRSTER. Until the end of that phase, when you look up a value on that model’s damage table, that model is treated as if it has suffered 0 wounds.
